item.title: Getting started with vertica
item.description: Installation or Setup # Operational System Setup (Linux-CentOS x64 or RedHat x64) 1-Increase the swap space to a minimum of 2 Gb 2-Space and CPU requirements: -Vertica requires at least 1 GB per CPU. -disk utilization per node should no more than sixty percent (60%). Disk space is temporarily required by certain query execution operators, such as hash joins and sorts, in the case when they have to spill to disk.
